description:
Rokudo manages to reach the roof and attempts to stop Ranna from hurting Otohime. When he does, he`s forced to confront a question he`s been avoiding all along: What if she doesn`t want to stop?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: On forgera nous-mêmes notre vie heureuse !
Our Dream School Lives Have Begun
Risou no Gakuen Seikatsu no Hajimari Da!
理想の学園生活の始まりだ!
